claim: • Name translations pose a greater complexity because the set of names is open and highly dynamic
text: • Name translations pose a greater complexity because the set of names is open and highly dynamic .

claim: It is also important to acknowledge that there are many fundamental differences between the translation of names and other tokensa name is rendered phonetically
text: It is also important to acknowledge that there are many fundamental differences between the translation of names and other tokens , depending on whether a name is rendered phonetically , semantically , or a mixture of both ( Ji et al. , 2009 ) .

claim: • The artificial settings of assigning low weights to informationgovernment evaluations have discouraged MT developers to spend time and explore resources to tackle this problem
text: • The artificial settings of assigning low weights to information translation ( compared to overall word translation ) in some largescale government evaluations have discouraged MT developers to spend time and explore resources to tackle this problem .
